name: lisa
description: 1. Download a copy/make a clone/make a fork of the project and move it to a folder in your web server.  1. Rename/duplicate config.php-setup and database.php-setup to config.php and database.php respectively.  1. Edit these config files to match your system. Most important is:     * Add your hostname.     * Enter the settings of your database.  1. Navigate to __YOUR_HOSTNAME__/index.php/Install to initialise the database.
author: Adriaan Knapen <a.d.knapen@protonmail.com>
